Crumbling Codex

A guide to the ruins of Krümblegård.

Traprock

Some stone is alive.

- Traprock can remain dormant until disturbed.
- Linger too long, and it may awaken.

Traprock

Traprock are small ambush predators.

- Expect them to strike quickly.
- Clear space so you can kite safely.

Pebblit

Some stones crawl.

- Pebblit are hostile by default.
- Offer cobblestone to tame one.

Wayfall

A broken sky-realm beyond the world.

- The Wayfall holds Attuned Ore.
- Mine it with Netherite (or better).

Runic craft

Runic tools require:
- Attuned Rune Shards (from Attuned Ore)
- A Runic Core (from Krümblegård)
